page.title: 09Villager of Baston
page.content: The woman has lived in the{village}for 16 years. She enjoys the quietness of living in a village. There are four people living in the house. Herself,husband and two children. She is an auxiliary nurse and her husband is a crane driver. Because she works in Peterborough she needs a car to get to work but feels a car is essential living in Baston. There are quite a lot of bazaars and fetes in the village frome time to time;these are well attended. The atmosphere in the village is friendly and the residents don't mind{newcomers.}The only changes which have occured in the village are the building of the Cardyke Drive estate and the expansion of Kirkstone House School. She{shops}mainly in Bourne but uses the village shops also because they are convenient.
